verses.verse: וַיְדַבֵּ֤ר <S%H1696><s%> spake יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁ֔ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses בְּהַ֥ר <S%H2022><s%> in mount סִינַ֖י <S%H5514><s%> Sinai לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

דַּבֵּ֞ר <S%H1696><s%> Speak אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to בְּנֵ֤י <S%H1121><s%> unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וְאָמַרְתָּ֣ <S%H559><s%> and say אֲלֵהֶ֔ם <S%H413><s%> to כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> When תָבֹ֙אוּ֙ <S%H935><s%> unto them When ye come אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> into הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> into the land אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which אֲנִ֖י <S%H589><s%> I נֹתֵ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> which I give לָכֶ֑ם וְשָׁבְתָ֣ה <S%H7673><s%> keep הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> you then shall the land שַׁבָּ֖ת <S%H7676><s%> a sabbath לַיהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD

שֵׁ֤שׁ <S%H8337><s%> Six שָׁנִים֙ <S%H8141><s%> years תִּזְרַ֣ע <S%H2232><s%> thou shalt sow שָׂדֶ֔ךָ <S%H7704><s%> thy field וְשֵׁ֥שׁ <S%H8337><s%> and six שָׁנִ֖ים <S%H8141><s%> years תִּזְמֹ֣ר <S%H2168><s%> thou shalt prune כַּרְמֶ֑ךָ <S%H3754><s%> thy vineyard וְאָסַפְתָּ֖ <S%H622><s%> and gather אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> תְּבוּאָתָֽהּ׃ <S%H8393><s%> in the fruit

וּבַשָּׁנָ֣ה <S%H8141><s%> year הַשְּׁבִיעִ֗ת <S%H7637><s%> But in the seventh שַׁבַּ֤ת <S%H7676><s%> shall be a sabbath שַׁבָּתוֹן֙ <S%H7677><s%> of rest יִהְיֶ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> shall have לָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> unto the land שַׁבָּ֖ת <S%H7676><s%> a sabbath לַיהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> for the LORD שָֽׂדְךָ֙ <S%H7704><s%> thy field לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> nor תִזְרָ֔ע <S%H2232><s%> thou shalt neither sow וְכַרְמְךָ֖ <S%H3754><s%> thy vineyard לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> nor תִזְמֹֽר׃ <S%H2168><s%> nor prune

אֵ֣ת <S%H853><s%> סְפִ֤יחַ <S%H5599><s%> That which groweth of its own accord קְצִֽירְךָ֙ <S%H7105><s%> of thy harvest לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> shall not תִקְצ֔וֹר <S%H7114><s%> thou shalt not reap וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עִנְּבֵ֥י <S%H6025><s%> the grapes נְזִירֶ֖ךָ <S%H5139><s%> of thy vine undressed לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> shall not תִבְצֹ֑ר <S%H1219><s%> neither gather שְׁנַ֥ת <S%H8141><s%> [for] it is a year שַׁבָּת֖וֹן <S%H7677><s%> of rest יִהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> shall have לָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> unto the land

וְ֠הָיְתָה <S%H1961><s%> shall have שַׁבַּ֨ת <S%H7676><s%> And the sabbath הָאָ֤רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the land לָכֶם֙ לְאָכְלָ֔ה <S%H402><s%> shall be meat לְךָ֖ וּלְעַבְדְּךָ֣ <S%H5650><s%> for you for thee and for thy servant וְלַאֲמָתֶ֑ךָ <S%H519><s%> and for thy maid וְלִשְׂכִֽירְךָ֙ <S%H7916><s%> and for thy hired servant וּלְתוֹשָׁ֣בְךָ֔ <S%H8453><s%> and for thy stranger הַגָּרִ֖ים <S%H1481><s%> that sojourneth עִמָּֽךְ׃ <S%H5973><s%> Even

וְלִ֨בְהֶמְתְּךָ֔ <S%H929><s%> And for thy cattle וְלַֽחַיָּ֖ה <S%H2416><s%> and for the beast אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> that בְּאַרְצֶ֑ךָ <S%H776><s%> that [are] in thy land תִּהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> shall have כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all תְּבוּאָתָ֖הּ <S%H8393><s%> shall all the increase לֶאֱכֹֽל׃ <S%H398><s%> thereof be meat ס

וְסָפַרְתָּ֣ <S%H5608><s%> And thou shalt number לְךָ֗ שֶׁ֚בַע <S%H7651><s%> seven שַׁבְּתֹ֣ת <S%H7676><s%> sabbaths שָׁנִ֔ים <S%H8141><s%> of years שֶׁ֥בַע <S%H7651><s%> unto thee seven שָׁנִ֖ים <S%H8141><s%> years שֶׁ֣בַע <S%H7651><s%> seven פְּעָמִ֑ים <S%H6471><s%> times וְהָי֣וּ <S%H1961><s%> you have לְךָ֗ יְמֵי֙ <S%H3117><s%> and the space שֶׁ֚בַע <S%H7651><s%> of the seven שַׁבְּתֹ֣ת <S%H7676><s%> sabbaths הַשָּׁנִ֔ים <S%H8141><s%> of years תֵּ֥שַׁע <S%H8672><s%> and nine וְאַרְבָּעִ֖ים <S%H705><s%> shall be unto thee forty שָׁנָֽה׃ <S%H8141><s%> years

וְהַֽעֲבַרְתָּ֞ <S%H5674><s%> to sound שׁוֹפַ֤ר <S%H7782><s%> Then shalt thou cause the trumpet תְּרוּעָה֙ <S%H8643><s%> of the jubile בַּחֹ֣דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> month הַשְּׁבִעִ֔י <S%H7637><s%> [day] of the seventh בֶּעָשׂ֖וֹר <S%H6218><s%> on the tenth לַחֹ֑דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> month בְּיוֹם֙ <S%H3117><s%> in the day הַכִּפֻּרִ֔ים <S%H3725><s%> of atonement תַּעֲבִ֥ירוּ <S%H5674><s%> sound שׁוֹפָ֖ר <S%H7782><s%> shall ye make the trumpet בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אַרְצְכֶֽם׃ <S%H776><s%> throughout all your land

וְקִדַּשְׁתֶּ֗ם <S%H6942><s%> And ye shall hallow אֵ֣ת <S%H853><s%> שְׁנַ֤ת <S%H8141><s%> year הַחֲמִשִּׁים֙ <S%H2572><s%> the fiftieth שָׁנָ֔ה <S%H8141><s%> year וּקְרָאתֶ֥ם <S%H7121><s%> and proclaim דְּר֛וֹר <S%H1865><s%> liberty בָּאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> throughout [all] the land לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> to all יֹשְׁבֶ֑יהָ <S%H3427><s%> unto all the inhabitants יוֹבֵ֥ל <S%H3104><s%> thereof it shall be a jubile הִוא֙ <S%H1931><s%> he תִּהְיֶ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> become לָכֶ֔ם וְשַׁבְתֶּ֗ם <S%H7725><s%> unto you and ye shall return אִ֚ישׁ <S%H376><s%> every man אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to his אֲחֻזָּת֔וֹ <S%H272><s%> unto his possession וְאִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> every man אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to his מִשְׁפַּחְתּ֖וֹ <S%H4940><s%> unto his family תָּשֻֽׁבוּ׃ <S%H7725><s%> and ye shall return

יוֹבֵ֣ל <S%H3104><s%> A jubile הִ֗וא <S%H1931><s%> he שְׁנַ֛ת <S%H8141><s%> year הַחֲמִשִּׁ֥ים <S%H2572><s%> the fiftieth שָׁנָ֖ה <S%H8141><s%> year תִּהְיֶ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> shall have לָכֶ֑ם לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> nor תִזְרָ֔עוּ <S%H2232><s%> be unto you ye shall not sow וְלֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> nor תִקְצְרוּ֙ <S%H7114><s%> neither reap אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> for סְפִיחֶ֔יהָ <S%H5599><s%> that which groweth וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> nor תִבְצְר֖וּ <S%H1219><s%> of itself in it nor gather אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> נְזִרֶֽיהָ׃ <S%H5139><s%> [the grapes] in it of thy vine undressed

כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> is a יוֹבֵ֣ל <S%H3104><s%> For it [is] the jubile הִ֔וא <S%H1931><s%> it קֹ֖דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> it shall be holy תִּהְיֶ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> become לָכֶ֑ם מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> out הַ֨שָּׂדֶ֔ה <S%H7704><s%> thereof out of the field תֹּאכְל֖וּ <S%H398><s%> unto you ye shall eat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> תְּבוּאָתָֽהּ׃ <S%H8393><s%> the increase

בִּשְׁנַ֥ת <S%H8141><s%> In the year הַיּוֹבֵ֖ל <S%H3104><s%> of this jubile הַזֹּ֑את <S%H2063><s%> of you תָּשֻׁ֕בוּ <S%H7725><s%> ye shall return אִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> every man אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to his אֲחֻזָּתֽוֹ׃ <S%H272><s%> unto his possession

וְכִֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> If תִמְכְּר֤וּ <S%H4376><s%> And if thou sell מִמְכָּר֙ <S%H4465><s%> ought לַעֲמִיתֶ֔ךָ <S%H5997><s%> unto thy neighbour א֥וֹ <S%H176><s%> or קָנֹ֖ה <S%H7069><s%> or buyest מִיַּ֣ד <S%H3027><s%> hand עֲמִיתֶ֑ךָ <S%H5997><s%> [ought] of thy neighbour's אַל־ <S%H408><s%> shall not תּוֹנ֖וּ <S%H3238><s%> ye shall not oppress אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> one אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אָחִֽיו׃ <S%H251><s%> another

בְּמִסְפַּ֤ר <S%H4557><s%> According to the number שָׁנִים֙ <S%H8141><s%> of years אַחַ֣ר <S%H310><s%> after הַיּוֹבֵ֔ל <S%H3104><s%> the jubile תִּקְנֶ֖ה <S%H7069><s%> thou shalt buy מֵאֵ֣ת <S%H853><s%> עֲמִיתֶ֑ךָ <S%H5997><s%> of thy neighbour בְּמִסְפַּ֥ר <S%H4557><s%> [and] according unto the number שְׁנֵֽי־ <S%H8141><s%> of years תְבוּאֹ֖ת <S%H8393><s%> of the fruits יִמְכָּר־ <S%H4376><s%> he shall sell לָֽךְ׃

לְפִ֣י ׀ <S%H6310><s%> According רֹ֣ב <S%H7230><s%> to the multitude הַשָּׁנִ֗ים <S%H8141><s%> of years תַּרְבֶּה֙ <S%H7235><s%> thou shalt increase מִקְנָת֔וֹ <S%H4736><s%> the price וּלְפִי֙ <S%H6310><s%> thereof and according מְעֹ֣ט <S%H4591><s%> to the fewness הַשָּׁנִ֔ים <S%H8141><s%> of years תַּמְעִ֖יט <S%H4591><s%> thou shalt diminish מִקְנָת֑וֹ <S%H4736><s%> the price כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> for מִסְפַּ֣ר <S%H4557><s%> of it for [according] to the number תְּבוּאֹ֔ת <S%H8393><s%> [of the years] of the fruits ה֥וּא <S%H1931><s%> he מֹכֵ֖ר <S%H4376><s%> doth he sell לָֽךְ׃

וְלֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> shall not תוֹנוּ֙ <S%H3238><s%> Ye shall not therefore oppress אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> one אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֲמִית֔וֹ <S%H5997><s%> another וְיָרֵ֖אתָ <S%H3372><s%> but thou shalt fear מֵֽאֱלֹהֶ֑יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> for אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> I יְהֹוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> for I [am] the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H430><s%> your God

וַעֲשִׂיתֶם֙ <S%H6213><s%> Wherefore ye shall do אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> חֻקֹּתַ֔י <S%H2708><s%> my statutes וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִשְׁפָּטַ֥י <S%H4941><s%> my judgments תִּשְׁמְר֖וּ <S%H8104><s%> and keep וַעֲשִׂיתֶ֣ם <S%H6213><s%> and do אֹתָ֑ם <S%H853><s%> וִֽישַׁבְתֶּ֥ם <S%H3427><s%> them and ye shall dwell עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land לָבֶֽטַח׃ <S%H983><s%> in safety

וְנָתְנָ֤ה <S%H5414><s%> shall yield הָאָ֙רֶץ֙ <S%H776><s%> And the land פִּרְיָ֔הּ <S%H6529><s%> her fruit וַאֲכַלְתֶּ֖ם <S%H398><s%> and ye shall eat לָשֹׂ֑בַע <S%H7648><s%> your fill וִֽישַׁבְתֶּ֥ם <S%H3427><s%> and dwell לָבֶ֖טַח <S%H983><s%> therein in safety עָלֶֽיהָ׃ <S%H5921><s%> But

וְכִ֣י <S%H3588><s%> if תֹאמְר֔וּ <S%H559><s%> And if ye shall say מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> What נֹּאכַ֖ל <S%H398><s%> What shall we eat בַּשָּׁנָ֣ה <S%H8141><s%> year הַשְּׁבִיעִ֑ת <S%H7637><s%> the seventh הֵ֚ן <S%H2005><s%> if לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not נִזְרָ֔ע <S%H2232><s%> sow וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> or נֶאֱסֹ֖ף <S%H622><s%> nor gather אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> תְּבוּאָתֵֽנוּ׃ <S%H8393><s%> in our increase

וְצִוִּ֤יתִי <S%H6680><s%> Then I will command אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בִּרְכָתִי֙ <S%H1293><s%> my blessing לָכֶ֔ם בַּשָּׁנָ֖ה <S%H8141><s%> year הַשִּׁשִּׁ֑ית <S%H8345><s%> upon you in the sixth וְעָשָׂת֙ <S%H6213><s%> and it shall bring forth אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַתְּבוּאָ֔ה <S%H8393><s%> fruit לִשְׁלֹ֖שׁ <S%H7969><s%> for three הַשָּׁנִֽים׃ <S%H8141><s%> years

וּזְרַעְתֶּ֗ם <S%H2232><s%> And ye shall sow אֵ֚ת <S%H853><s%> הַשָּׁנָ֣ה <S%H8141><s%> year הַשְּׁמִינִ֔ת <S%H8066><s%> the eighth וַאֲכַלְתֶּ֖ם <S%H398><s%> and eat מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הַתְּבוּאָ֣ה <S%H8393><s%> fruit יָשָׁ֑ן <S%H3465><s%> [yet] of old עַ֣ד ׀ <S%H5704><s%> until הַשָּׁנָ֣ה <S%H8141><s%> year הַתְּשִׁיעִ֗ת <S%H8671><s%> until the ninth עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> when בּוֹא֙ <S%H935><s%> come in תְּב֣וּאָתָ֔הּ <S%H8393><s%> until her fruits תֹּאכְל֖וּ <S%H398><s%> ye shall eat יָשָֽׁן׃ <S%H3465><s%> [of] the old

וְהָאָ֗רֶץ <S%H776><s%> The land לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> not תִמָּכֵר֙ <S%H4376><s%> shall not be sold לִצְמִתֻ֔ת <S%H6783><s%> for ever כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for לִ֖י הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> for the land כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for גֵרִ֧ים <S%H1616><s%> [is] mine for ye [are] strangers וְתוֹשָׁבִ֛ים <S%H8453><s%> and sojourners אַתֶּ֖ם <S%H859><s%> you עִמָּדִֽי׃ <S%H5978><s%> against
